## Statistical Methods
Let $\pi_1=\mbox{probability of covid 19 in vaccine}$\
Let $\pi_2=\mbox{probability of covid 19 in placebo}$\
From the data table, we see that:\
$\hat \pi_1=\frac{8}{17411}$\
$\hat \pi_2=\frac{162}{17511}$\
$\hat\psi=\frac{\hat \pi_2-\hat \pi_1}{\hat \pi_2}$\
$\hat\psi=\frac{\frac{162}{17511}-\frac{8}{17411}}{\frac{162}{17511}}$\
$\hat\psi=\frac{446749}{470097}$\
$\hat\psi=0.950334$\
We see that vaccine reduces the size of the Covid 19 by 95\% compared to placebo.\
